title: BBC Local Live: Beds, Herts & Bucks on Tuesday, 1 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: a transgender prisoner has been found dead in her cell at hmp woodhill in milton keynes .
the family of hertfordshire businessman patrick hurling launch a fresh appeal for information , 25 years after he was murdered .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: we 're signing off from beds , herts & bucks live for the day now , but we 'll be back from 08:00 tomorrow to bring you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
we hope you 'll join us then .

documents.title: weather : mainly cloudy and dry overnight
text: it will be mainly cloudy and dry overnight , with a risk of some localised hill fog on the chilterns .
temperatures will remain mild for the time of year , but strong southwesterly winds will give a fresher feel with lows of 9c ( 48f ) .
weather has your local forecast .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: policeman accused of pursuing seven vulnerable woman for sex
text: a policeman pursued vulnerable women for sex after meeting them through the course of his work , luton crown court heard today .
simon salway , 39 , who was based at hatfield station , is said to have targetted seven women after they contacted police for help ; some were victims of domestic violence .
the officer has pleaded not guilty to seven charges of misconduct in a public office and the case is continuing .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: latest ofsted report into secondary school performance
text: this is the .
for pupils attending a good or outstanding secondary school across the three counties :
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: headlines : transgender prisoner found hanging at hmp woodhill detectives re-open investigation into accountant murder
text: the main stories this tea-time :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: junior doctors at the l & d seeing patients after strike called off
text: junior doctors at the luton & dunstable hospital have been seeing patients after a national strike was called off following a temporary agreement with the government .
i know the l & d hospital has told patients to come in for their appointment , and if they do we 're more than happy to treat them . ''
the british medical association has suspended the first of three walk-outs , along with two more which had been scheduled for the end of the month .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Beds, Herts and Bucks Live

documents.title: wycombe wanderers hoping for play off place
text: wycombe wanderers will move into the league two play-off places if they win at bristol rovers tonight .
the chairboys will be without suspended defender aaron pierre .
there will be full commentary tonight on three counties sport from 19:00 .
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: fundraising campaign launched to # savethebear
text: a luton jazz bar has launched a crowdfunding campaign to raise money to soundproof the venue after it was served with a noise abatement order .
the bear club says it needs £ 9,400 to meet the requirements set out by luton borough council .
in an email , owner justin doherty writes : `` 4,500 people signed the [ # savethebear ] petition .
that 's just over £ 2 each . ''

documents.title: buckinghamshire railway line plans
text: plans to open a railway line between bicester and bletchley are still on track after the transport secretary accepted a recent review into the east-west rail programme .
the project includes direct links to aylesbury .
conservative mp for aylesbury , david lidington , says it will provide valuable extra capacity and an improved service for people in the area .
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: ofsted publishes latest report into primary schools performance
text: this is the .
for pupils attending a good or outstanding primary schools across the three counties :
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Beds, Herts & Bucks Live

documents.title: burning pile of waste in beaconsfield
text: a pile of burning commercial waste was reported near a main road in beaconsfield this morning .
author: Bucks Free Press

documents.title: detectives re-examine 1990 murder
text: the family of a hertfordshire businessman found strangled and beaten in a fire at his home 25 years ago say their father 's death hangs like a `` black cloud '' over them .
detectives are to re-interview witnesses spoken to at the time in connection with the murder of patrick hurling .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Beds, Herts & Bucks Live

documents.title: thames valley police 'must improve traveller and gypsy data '
text: thames valley police must improve how it records data on gypsies , roma and travellers `` as a matter of urgency '' , an independent review has said .
it found the problem was compounded by the force 's outdated and disjointed it systems , one of which was at least 25 years old .
but it also praised the `` high quality training '' offered by the force .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: new head of hertfordshire special constabulary 'delighted ' at role
text: hertfordshire police have appointed chief inspector stephen o'keeffe to lead their team of volunteer police officers .
the new head of hertfordshire 's special constabulary says he 's `` delighted to take on the role '' after starting his career as a special constable 21 years ago at hertford police station .
ch insp o'keeffe joined the regular force just a year later .
i understand the commitment it takes and how rewarding devoting free time to supporting the local community can be . ''
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines : transgender prisoner found dead herts murder case
text: the stories we 're looking at this afternoon :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: transgender woman found hanged in woodhill prison named
text: a transgender woman found hanged in her cell at hmp woodhill in milton keynes has been named as joanne latham .
the 38-year-old was found unresponsive on friday morning before being pronounced dead at 06:20 .
`` as with all deaths in custody there will be an investigation by the independent prisons and probation ombudsman , '' a prison service spokesman said .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: second recent death of transgender woman in all-male prison
text: a post-mortem examination is yet to be carried out on a transgender woman found dead in her cell in milton keynes ' woodhill prison , a spokesman for the coroner 's service has said .
the death of the prisoner , who was serving life for attempted murder , is the second recently of a transgender woman in a men 's prison .
last month inmate vikki thompson , 21 , was found dead at hmp leeds .

documents.title: police confirm death of inmate at woodhill prison
text: thames valley police have confirmed they are aware of the death of an inmate at woodhill prison in milton keynes .
a transgender woman was found hanged in her cell in the early hours of friday morning .

documents.title: staff found transgender woman hanged in early hours on friday
text: a transgender woman has been found hanged in her cell at the all-male woodhill prison in milton keynes .

staff found that the observation panel on the prisoner 's cell was covered just after 04:00 on friday , and after getting no response from her , they forced entry through the door , which had been barricaded .
the staff administered cpr until paramedics arrived , but the prisoner was pronounced dead at 06:20 .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: transgender prisoner found dead 'had barricaded door of cell '
text: a prison service report seen by the bbc said a transgender prisoner found hanged in her cell at woodhill prison had barricaded the door of her cell .
the ligature was removed but the inmate , serving life at the milton keynes prison for attempted murder , was pronounced dead at 06:20 on friday .

documents.title: transgender prisoner found hanged at woodhill prison
text: a transgender prisoner has been found hanging by the neck in her cell at the all-male hmp woodhill prison , the bbc has learned .
she was found by a prison officer at the milton keynes prison in the early hours of friday .

documents.title: breakingtransgender inmate found dead in cell
text: a transgender woman prisoner is found dead in her cell at an all-male prison , the bbc has learned .

documents.title: roundhead costume stolen from st albans man
text: hertfordshire police is searching for a roundhead costume after it was stolen from a civil war re-enactor in st albans .
the man was loading his car outside the scout hut on riverside road on the evening of 2 november when someone stole a box .
thieves got away with a 17th century steel helmet , replica sword , dagger as well as replica period clothing .
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: fresh appeal for help in 25 year old hertford murder case
text: despite numerous appeals , including a crimewatch feature and the offer of a £ 20,000 reward , police have been unable to find those responsible for the murder of a hertfordshire businessman 25 years ago .
the body of patrick hurling , 45 , was found in his home in bengeo street in hertford on 1 december 1990 .
he 'd been beaten and a fire had been started in the house .
his daughter , lorna ringer , from bishop 's stortford , said : `` we 've lived this nightmare now for 25 years , it 's caused so much heartache . ''
at one point there were three arrests but no-one was ever charged .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: syria air strikes : three counties mps prepare for vote
text: mps in beds , herts and bucks have been making their intentions known ahead of a vote in the commons tomorrow over whether to launch air strikes into syria .
gavin shuker , labour mp for luton south , has said he is against action , as is the labour mp for luton north , kelvin hopkins , and the conservative mp for stevenage , stephen mcpartland .
the conservative mp for hitchin and harpenden , peter lilley , says he is leaning towards voting against action but will wait to be persuaded during the debate .

documents.title: shefford boys ' home sex abuse inquiry : two men plead not guilty
text: two mencharged with abusing 26 childrenat a catholic boys ' home in bedfordshire more than 40 years ago have pleaded not guilty at luton magistrates ' court .

james mccann ( right ) , 79 , of suffield court , swaffham , norfolk , is charged with 18 sexual assaults and 48 assaults in connection with st francis boys ' home , shefford , between 1963 and 1974 .
john cahill ( left ) , 73 , of chandos court , bedford , has been charged with six sexual offences against four boys .
they will appear again at luton crown court on 22 december .

documents.title: do 20 % of british muslims really sympathise with jihadists ?
text: last week , the uk 's most popular newspaper , the sun , ran the headline `` 1 in 5 brit muslims ' sympathy for jihadis '' .
where did that statistic come from and how reliable is it ?
author: James Melley
BBC News

documents.title: veteran who served in falkland islands and yemen speaks of support
text: a royal marines veteran from milton keynes has spoken of the incredible support he has received from national military charity , blind veterans uk , since he began losing his eyesight seven years ago .
author: One MK

documents.title: weather watchers : sun trying to break through in hertford
text: our weather watchers have been out in force this morning taking photographs of the three counties .
in hertford , it looks as though the sun is trying to make an appearance , but the cloud is keeping it at bay .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: lunchtime headlines : men in court over boys ' home abuse long queues on m25 clockwise
text: the stories we 're looking at this lunchtime :
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : clean up ongoing on m25 clockwise
text: highways england has tweeted that an extensive clean up operation is ongoing on the m25 between j21a-j22 to remove debris on the carriageway after a lorry overturned .
# m25 c/w j21a - j22 extensive clean up work is ongoing .
severe delays remain .
# hertfordshire
@ twitterid @ twitterid yet another lorry causing mayhem , what are you doing to stop accidents & deaths caused by lorries ?
@ twitterid can we use this for a story please ?
will credit .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: m25 clockwise queues after rubbish on road : in
text: this is the scene on the m25 clockwise where rubbish has been strewn across the carriageway after a lorry overturned between j21a and j22 .
three lanes remain closed with traffic queuing for 10 miles .
the entry slip road from the m1 southbound is closed clockwise .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: commercial waste fire blocks road in beaconsfield
text: in beaconsfield , amersham road in both directions is partially blocked due to the fire service dealing with a blaze involving commercial waste .
the incident is between magpie lane and longbottom lane and fire engines are partially blocking the carriageway .
traffic is queuing .

documents.title: weather : a mainly dry , but cloudy afternoon
text: it will be mostly dry and cloudy this afternoon , although a few bright or sunny intervals are possible .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: rosberg finished strong but this was hamilton 's year - coulthard
text: the formula 1 season ended on sunday with a third consecutive victory for mercedes driver nico rosberg , but it is important to remember how the year started .

the german had his moments but , generally speaking , hertfordshire 's lewis hamilton was in complete control of the season from melbourne until he won the title in austin in october with three races still to go .
it was the lewis hamilton show , and rosberg was left looking punch drunk on the ropes .
read more here .
author: David Coulthard
BBC F1 co-commentator

documents.title: travel : delays on trains at milton keynes three lanes closed on m25 in herts
text: london midland and virgin trains through central milton keynes will be delayed until 12:30 , national rail says , due to safety checks on the line .
three lanes remain closed on the m25 clockwise at j21a-j22 after a lorry overturned and rubbish was strewn across the road .
there is congestion back to j18 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: sports personality of the year : highlights video of nominees
text: we heard earlier how the three champs of the three counties have made the bbc sports personality of the year shortlist - hemel gymnast max whitlock , milton keynes long-jumper greg rutherford and hertfordshire 's f1 driver lewis hamilton .
here 's a video of all 12 nominees at the top of their game

documents.title: introducing track of the week : hitchin 's alex holmes
text: hitchin 's alex holmes is our bbc introducing track of the week on bbc three counties radio .
the singer-songwriter uploaded her track black hole to us a few weeks ago , and we loved it so much , we 're featuring it all this week on shows across the schedule .
author: BBC Introducing... in Beds, Herts and Bucks

documents.title: patrick hurling murder : hertfordshire family 'living a nightmare ' for 25 years
text: the daughter of a hertfordshire man who was murdered 25 years ago today , has said they 've been living a `` nightmare '' .
lorna ringer 's father patrick hurling was killed in his home in bengeo street in hertford in 1990 .
she says her and her sister nicola daley are desperate for answers , and hope someone will come forward with new information .
`` it would mean we could go ahead and grieve for our dad properly without a cloud hanging over us , '' lorna said .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : rubbish across carriageway of m25 clockwise
text: three lanes are closedon the m25 clockwise between j21a for the m1 and j22 due to an overturned lorry and rubbish across the carriageway .
there is congestion back to j19 .
our # trafficofficers are working hard to clear the debris from the carriageway on # m25 c/w j21a-j22 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: latest headlines : herts murder appeal aylesbury shooting accused in court
text: the top stories this morning :
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: man tracks down stolen wallet through contactless payments
text: when tony milioti had his wallet stolen in bedford last week , he took it upon himself to track down those responsible - on his birthday .

by tracking where his contactless card was being used , or in some places declined , after talking to his bank , he managed to find the two men responsible , but said `` it really ruined my birthday '' .
`` i just wanted to send a message out that you can be a victim of contactless , '' mr milioti said .
author: Justin Dealey
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: pothole procedure set to change in hertfordshire
text: plans to reform the response to pothole complaints in hertfordshire are set to be rolled out .
author: Hertfordshire Mercury

documents.title: woburn abbey christmas lights event : 'very bad situation ' , says duke of bedford
text: the duke of bedford has said more than 3,000 people will be due a refund after a christmas display at woburn abbey on saturday received numerous complaints .
the duke admitted there were a number of problems at the luminaires woburnensis , including `` the traffic , the traffic planning , the parking '' .
we 're going to learn a lot from it .
it 's a very bad situation ''

documents.title: man in court over aylesbury shooting
text: a man will appear at wycombe magistrates ' court this morning following a shooting in aylesbury on sunday which left a man with leg injuries .
the 21-year-old has been charged with grievous bodily harm and carrying a firearm with criminal intent after the incident in a house in banks yard .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : m25 slow in hertfordshire and cheshunt train delays
text: one lane is blocked on the m25 anticlockwise before j23 due to a broken down car .
congestion to j25 .
abellio greater anglia services are delayed by up to 10 minutes at cheshunt due to a faulty train .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: hertfordshire mp questions air strikes in syria
text: a senior hertfordshire conservative mp says he has doubts about launching british air strikes against the so-called islamic state militants in syria .
david cameron is to ask his cabinet to endorse a one-day commons debate and vote tomorrow over the strikes .

peter lilley , mp for hitchin and harpenden , said : `` i 'm not convinced yet that they 've learnt the lessons of afghanistan , iraq , libya , which proved it 's easy to destroy a regime but almost impossible to install a new one or defeat insurgency by air power alone . ''
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: bushey crash left two in hospital
text: two people were taken to hospital after being cut free by firefighters from a crash in london road in bushey .
the collision , which happened at about 18:30 yesterday , caused major traffic delays in watford .
we get ready to take off the roof as we rescue the occupants .
@ twitterid hi , would you mind if we used the credit of course .
@ twitterid of course not ; - )
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: hertford murder appeal 25 years on
text: the family of a hertfordshire businessman who was murdered 25 years ago are launching a fresh appeal for help to find his killers .
patrick hurling 's body was found in his home in bengeo street , hertford , on 1 december 1990 .
he 'd been beaten and a fire had been started in the house .
author: Gail Sanderson
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: sports personality of the year : three counties champs rutherford , hamilton and whitlock
text: three world champions from the three counties have made the shortlist for the 2015 bbc sports personality of the year .
milton keynes long jumper greg rutherford , hertfordshire f1 driver lewis hamilton and hemel hempstead gymnast max whitlock are among 12 nominees including mo farah and tyson fury .
the awards ceremony will take place on 20 december .

documents.title: weather : a mainly cloudy day with some light rain
text: outbreaks of mainly light rain at first this morning , before becoming mostly dry and cloudy .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: morning headlines : herts mp 'doubts ' over syria air strikes man in court for aylesbury shooting
text: the stories we 're looking at this morning :
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: welcome to local live for beds , herts and bucks
text: good morning and welcome to tuesday 's live page for the three counties , where we 'll bring you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if there 's something we should be talking about or you 'd simply like to get in touch , you can email , tweet or contact us via facebook .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live
